Taichi is Chinese traditional sports , which combines fistic movement with Chinese traditional medical theory . it will help you create healthy mind and graceful habitude with eastern charm .中国传统的运动项目，把拳术的形体动作与中医学中的引导、吐纳等理论相结合，其外形缓慢柔美，姿势舒展，劲在内涵，将为您创造健康的心理
